dcterms:description: LRW is an English word-level VSR dataset which contains 500 words with 800â€“1,000 video clips per class. Each video clip has 29 frames with a 1.16 second duration, focusing on lip movement.

dcterms:description: LRW-1000 is a Mandarin word-level VSR dataset containing 1,000 words and a total of 718,808 video clips. The video clips are cropped and resized to match the time alignment between video and audio.
dcterms:title: LRW-1000
